#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    char c='a';
    long long inc=0,calc=0;
    while(1)
    {
        inc+=100;
        c=getchar();
        if(c=='\n'||c==EOF)
            break;
        if(c=='H'||c=='h')
            calc+=inc;
        else
            calc-=inc;
    }
    printf("%lld\n",calc);

}
